0110100000001010 0111001010101000 0 -> sum: 1101101010110010, cout: 0
1000010100101100 0100100101000010 0 -> sum: 1100111001101110, cout: 0
0001110100110101 0000001110101011 0 -> sum: 0010000011100000, cout: 0
1000011111110001 0100100110001001 0 -> sum: 1101000101111010, cout: 0
0100111001000001 0100010111001000 1 -> sum: 1001010000001010, cout: 0
1111001111011111 1110100100001001 0 -> sum: 1101110011101000, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
